reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Focused and differentiated HIV prevention and treatment in Sudan

description.narrative: Sudan - HIV - United Nations Development Programme - UNDP Sudan. This program has the following goals: Eliminate HIV in Sudan as a public health threat by 2030.. The objectives of this program are: To increase Coverage of key populations with the integrated package of preventive and treatment services (NSP ER 2.1.). To increase Coverage of quality ART services (NSP ER3.2.). To improve Dignity and quality of life of people living with HIV is (NSP PA 6). To improve Functionality of the monitoring & evaluation system to strategically inform the HIV response

title.narrative: Impact indicator for SDN-H-UNDP
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
HIV incidence among 15-49 age group
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Coverage / Output indicator for SDN-H-UNDP
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed during the reporting period
Percentage of health facilities reporting no stock-outs of essential drugs
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of ART sites that had a stock-out of any antiretroviral drugs during the reporting period
Percentage of HIV-positive patients who were screened for TB in HIV care or treatment settings
Percentage of people living with HIV initiated on ART who are screened for TB in HIV treatment settings
Percentage of pregnant women who know their HIV status
Percentage of PLHIV on ART who initiated TB preventive therapy among those eligible during the reporting period
Outcome indicator for SDN-H-UNDP
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of (estimated) people living with HIV who have been tested HIV-positive
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
